glsa.title: nghttp2: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: Nghttp2 is vulnerable to a Denial of Service attack.

background.p: Nghttp2 is an implementation of HTTP/2 and its header compression algorithm HPACK in C.

description.p: Nghttpd, nghttp, and libnghttp2_asio applications do not limit the memory usage for the incoming HTTP header field. If a peer sends a specially crafted HTTP/2 HEADERS frame and CONTINUATION frame, they will crash with an out of memory error.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
